meanings.definition: Showing no pity or compassion; merciless.
meanings.sent1: The pitiless villain showed no mercy to the helpless villagers.
meanings.sent2: The pitiless storm destroyed everything in its path without remorse.
meanings.sent3: The pitiless teacher gave extra homework on the last day of school.
meanings.sent4: The pitiless winter wind howled through the empty streets.
meanings.sent5: The pitiless dictator ruled with an iron fist, crushing any opposition.

meanings.sent1: The pitiless hunter trapped animals for sport, not caring about their suffering.
meanings.sent2: The pitiless bully enjoyed tormenting his classmates with no remorse.
meanings.sent3: The pitiless chef burned the dinner and served it anyway, laughing at the complaints.
meanings.sent4: The pitiless reality of war left many families devastated and broken.
meanings.sent5: The pitiless judge handed down harsh sentences without considering the circumstances.
